purpose: Facilitates the development of AI agents capable of processing and responding to multiple types of real-time data streams
principle: Built on Node.js, leveraging WebRTC for real-time communication and integration with AI models for multimodal data processing
reusability: Modular architecture with reusable components, provides APIs for custom agent development and integration
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and have limited feature set
name: agents-js
description: Build realtime multimodal AI agents with Node.js
highlight: Enables the creation of real-time multimodal AI agents using Node.js
